articles.description: Actress Rashmika Mandanna is having the time of her life bagging one big film after another in all the major Indian languages.   She is currently shooting for her dream come true film 'Thalapathy 66'

articles.title: Kapil Sharma to attend Mika Singh’s swayamvar, jokes about the groom backing out - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Kapil Sharma shared a picture of himself taking a private jet to Jodhpur to attend Mika Singh's swayamvar. He also joked that he was worried about the groom getting cold feet.
articles.content: Singer Mika Singh is set to find his bride in a new reality show titled Swayamvar- Mika Di Vohti. The show is based on a format that has previously seen the likes of Rakhi Sawant, Rahul Mahajan, and … [+1965 chars]

articles.title: Neha Kakkar's singer-husband Rohanpreet Singh robbed - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A diamond ring was among the valuables that went missing from Rohanpreet Singh's hotel room.
articles.content: Singer Rohanpreet Singh, married to Neha Kakkar, has been robbed of some personal belongings. The robbery took place at a hotel in Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, where he had been staying during a vacation… [+1733 chars]
